Text: There's no subs at all, dont waste your time.

ENGLISH SUBTITLES FINALLY!

http://pastebin.com/EfA94Hwb

I'm kind of late, but I just found these today.

1. Save text file to same folder as movie
2. Change "txt" extension to "srt" and use same filename as movie
3. Open movie in VLC
4. Under subtitles options, open SRT
5. Enjoy!
